Articles.Content:
Hi!

I`m looking for a mod pack with chutes or a way to modify stock ones so they can open above 5000m.

Real chutes is sadly not an option (it summons BSoD).
Just change the Min Pressure and the Chutes will open earlier. Right click on the Chutes.

That is one way, yes - if that's not enough for you, then "RealChute" let's you tweak more parachute parameters than you'll ever need. It even has presets for main, drogue and drag chutes, and at the cost of extra weight, you can design combo-chutes (i.e., drogue plus main chute).

Try out RealChute (as rynak said).

RealChute is 100% awesome.

100% cool.

100% practical.

100% fun.

100% 100%!
